name: Dark Verge
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You transform yourself into a shadow on the ground. You can move freely through any area not in bright light. You can cling to an adjacent creature's shadow for 0 AP, and move with them. You can't attack or cast non-Shadow spells in this form, but you can't be attacked or take damage from non-Radiant spells in this form.

If you are forced into bright light while you are not clinging to a creature's shadow, you take 50 radiant damage that can't be reduced or negated, and the spell immediately ends, shunting you into the nearest empty space.
